application_type_full: Approval of details reserved by a condition (discharge)
decision_conditions: Insufficient information has been provided with regards to Condition 8 (Sustainability and Energy Conservation) of planning permission 22/02399/FUL. Therefore the proposal fails to demonstrate compliance in relation to sustainability and energy conservation, in accordance with policies CS1, DM3 and DM4 of the LDF Core Strategy 2012.

Insufficient information has been provided with regards to 10 (Landscaping) of planning permission 22/02399/FUL. Therefore the proposal would fail to ensure a satisfactory appearance on completion of the development, in accordance with policies CS8 and DM10 of the LDF Core Strategy 2012.
description: Details required for conditions 7 (Drainage Details), 8 (Sustainability and Energy Conservation), 9 (Nature Conservation Scheme), 10 (Landscaping), 11 (Waste Facilities), 12 (Cycle Facilities), 14 (Construction Management Plan) and 16 (Fire Safety Strategy) of planning permission 22/02399/FUL (Demolition of existing dwelling and erection of 2no. three-storey semi detached dwellings)
